body_html: Regarding using PersistentTensor, I think PersistentTensor is poorly named and that that comment is a bit out-of-date. Just using Tensors should be fine. The PersistentTensor existed to deal with synchronization between multiple GPU streams.
body_text: Regarding using PersistentTensor, I think PersistentTensor is poorly named and that that comment is a bit out-of-date.  Just using Tensors should be fine.  The PersistentTensor existed to deal with synchronization between multiple GPU streams.
body: Regarding using PersistentTensor, I think PersistentTensor is poorly named and that that comment is a bit out-of-date.  Just using Tensors should be fine.  The PersistentTensor existed to deal with synchronization between multiple GPU streams.
